sentence.Network_en: All of the capital investment is made by the licensee.

entry.tran: 执照领有人；许可证接受者
entry.def: A licensee is a person or organization that has been given a licence.
A licensee is someone who has been given a licence to sell alcoholic drinks, for example in a pub.

means.word_mean: 1. someone to whom a license is granted

auth_sentence.content: One disgruntled licensee is enough to tip off a regulator.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: One disgruntled licensee is enough to tip off a regulator.
